summary: Livro 1: A Guerra dos Tronos – 2010 | A Game of Thrones – 1996
title: Livro 1: A Guerra dos Tronos – 2010 | A Game of Thrones – 1996
body:
Livro 1: A Guerra dos Tronos – 2010 | A Game of Thrones – 1996

A Game of Thrones, traduzido para o português A Guerra dos Tronos, é o primeiro livro da saga de fantasia épica As Crônicas de Gelo e Fogo, escrita por George R. R. Martin e publicada pela editora Bantam Spectra.

A rede de televisão a cabo HBO deu vida ao universo criado por George com a série multimilionária com o mesmo nome dessa primeira entrega, Game of Thrones.

Publicado originalmente em 6…

View On WordPress

summary: I've never read the books, so I'm sure I missed out on a lot of clues when it comes to Jonsa. I'm a show watcher of Game of...
question: I've never read the books, so I'm sure I missed out on a lot of clues when it comes to Jonsa. I'm a show watcher of Game of Thrones. Sansa is my favorite and I love Jon, so I wouldn't be mad or anything if they did get together, but I just haven't seen anything on my end that points to that endgame. Is there any posts or meta or anything you can recommend to me that gives me more insight on Jonsa and why many fans feel it's endgame? If there is something I missed, I'd like to know!
answer:
See I’m the wrong person to ask because I’m not invested (I don’t ship it, I’m just a fan of Jonsas themselves) but I did notice some weirdness in their scenes. They weren’t written like siblings the way Sansa and Bran and (for a brief moment) Sansa and Arya. I ignored it because I assumed it’s because Jon and Sansa were never close but then you have the tent scene, the lighting and the argument. Then the weird forehead kiss that wasn’t sibling-like at all. I still didn’t see it besides noting how odd their scenes were until Jon and Dany. Their scenes are like the opposite of Jon and Sansa scenes where the intimacy was utterly absent and I never got the sense that Jon liked being around Dany or that he was invested in her wellbeing.

As for meta, you should probably check out @trinuviel @fortunatelylori @lady-in-a-song @lostlittlesatallites @athimbleful @rose-of-red-lake

tags: house targaryen vs fire nation royal family
summary:
Parallels: Part 3/5
Name patterns: -ae-, -y- | -z-
‘Aegon, Rhaenys, Maegor, Daenerys, Viserys, Jaehaerys’
‘Sozin, Azulon, Ozai,...
body:
House Targaryen | Fire Nation Royal Family

Parallels: Part 3/5

Name patterns: -ae-, -y- | -z-

  • ‘Aegon, Rhaenys, Maegor, Daenerys, Viserys, Jaehaerys’
  • ‘Sozin, Azulon, Ozai, Zuko, Azula, Izumi’

Features: Silver hair and violet eyes | Black hair and golden eyes

Wisdom: Aemon Targaryen | Iroh

  • ’Love is the bane of honor, the death of duty’ Aemon Targaryen
  • ’Pride is not the opposite of shame, but its source. True humility is the only antidote to shame’ Iroh

Madness: Aerys II Targaryen | Azula

  • ’Madness and greatness are two sides of the same coin. Every time a new Targaryen is born the gods toss the coin and the world holds its breath to see how it will land’ Jaehaerys II Targaryen
  • ’My own mother thought I was a monster’ Azula

Banished Princes: Viserys Targaryen | Zuko

  • ’Who can rule without wealth or fear or love?’ Viserys Targaryen
  • ’My honor. My throne. My country. I’m about to lose them all’ Zuko

tags: notice I don't need to tag it anti-cersei because her fans aren't delicate snowflaykes
summary: Double Standards I was (rather strangely) accused of holding Daenerys Targaryen to a different standard than other characters....
caption:
Double Standards

I was (rather strangely) accused of holding Daenerys Targaryen to a different standard than other characters. Strange because I have tried to hold her to the same standards of morality as all the other characters. In fact I believe it is her fans who do not hold her to the same standard. She pulls the same murderous stuff that Cersei does but doesn’t get called evil for doing it, unlike Cersei.

1. Called to a trial which may result in a death sentence.

2. Rigs the location of the trial, which is an important cultural place of worship, so that it will burn down.

3. Commits mass murder, removing all the opposing rulers who were challenging her authority. Gloats as she watches them burn.

4. Seizes power.

The difference is that Cersei doesn’t pretend she is righteous. Daenerys holds herself up as a righteous goddess above all judgment. She ain’t all that.

summary: Era stato Aegon il Conquistatore a ordinarne la costruzione e Maegor il Crudele, suo figlio, ne aveva visto il completamento....
caption:

Catelyn Stark

blog.description: I like to chat about a song of ice and fire, history, star wars, handmaid's tale, music and whatever your heart desires. ocassional NSFW. if you wanna talk say about anything nad i mean anything. HIT ME UP I also enjoy anime such as death note, ergo proxy, samurai x, neon genesis evangelion, paranoia agent, serial experiments lain and others! ALSO i love travelling and meeting new people if you are ever in portugal say it so we can match a platonic date and GO CATCH POKEMON GOOOO. Maybe other stuff you would like to know. I'm a history enthusiast, so teach me about your history. i LOVE to learn new languages teach me yours. I'm also addicted to history tell me the history of your country, town and all that. if you got a cool skill that you can teach me. please do that too! I do enjoy a chit chat about naughty or lewd stuff. soo if you are feeling a little bit horny and wanna talk about like super sexy stuff. YOU COME TO THE RIGHT PLACE although i admit i can be a bit shy... There is a lot that i dont understand about love and all. I wish for you to teach me. So school me about what makes you feel. Different. I believe i shall get to know all forms. I hope you can love me specially if its platonic. I thing another interrsting stuff to add is that I like cute selfies! If you wanna talk in instagram send a dm 😊 ill try responding as fast as i can.if you want really keep talking with me ask for my instagram...but ill have to think since i really want someone to talk about crazy stuff things that make cool dont follow me just to unfollow im not here to fulfill your ego. or not say anything when claiming you want to talk i hate boring people just dont try freind. Another thing i love is horror and psycholohgical stuff. If you got any horror tale or just wanna vent count me on. Also enjoy talking about things that get me bothered and scared. If you also wanna discuss politics sure!

summary: [SPOILERS] What is your opinion on the Hound?
title: [SPOILERS] What is your opinion on the Hound?
body:
My main question is do you think Sandor Clegane (The Hound) is good, bad, or has a mixture of good and bad qualities? And why do you feel that way about him?

Any other opinions that aren’t related to the question are more than welcome as I’m a bit indecisive about what I think of him and I’m curious to see what others think



Source: https://ift.tt/2DDz0C1
